alert.note: Alert for Mississippi (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 5:27PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Mississippi, north central Tipton and southwestern Lauderdale Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 527 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Luxora, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Osceola, Luxora, Fort Pillow State Park, Burdette, Fulton, Ashport, Ft Pillow, Gilt Edge, Burlison, Garland, Victoria, O`Donnell Bend, Hightower, Tuckertown, Rosa, Luckett, Chilson, Keyes Port, Lens Ford and Moran. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
